data.name: Top Health Ingredients
data.description: Top Health Ingredients has been a leading industry-trusted ingredient supplier for over a decade. Our entire portfolio of plant-based ingredient solutions is consistently tested, at source and beyond, to ensure our products are free from GMOs & allergens, and that they meet or exceed spec every single time. The Top Health team strives to provide the food, beverage, and wellness industries with innovative, unique plant-based ingredients that help solve many of these markets' most arduous formulation challenges - giving our clients the market edge they need to excel in such fast-growing fields. Top Health is a family-owned company that is wholly dedicated to quality, transparency, and excellency - always operating to support a healthier, more sustainable future!

data.name: AdvantaMung
data.description: AdvantaMung™ boasts a higher water-holding capacity than other similar proteins, making it ideal for texture-dependent applications like pasta & meat analogs. AdvantaMung™ is non-GMO, gluten-free, pleasant on the palate, & higher in fiber than pea protein - a versatile protein for virtually any function.

data.name: AdvantaRice
data.description: AdvantaRice™ is 80% organic brown rice protein powder and a high protein alternative. AdvantaRice™ is mild, neutral flavor and is easily masked. AdvantaRice™ can be used in both sweet and savory formulas.

data.name: Advantitol
data.description: Advantitol™ is a zero-calorie Erythritol powder  sourced from non-GMO corn starch. Advantitol™ is approximately 70% as sweet as sucrose. It is ideal for confectionary, beverage, and baked applications.

data.name: AdvantaThrive
data.description: AdvantaThrive™ is 90% Isomaltooligosaccharide powder, a soluble vegetable prebiotic, sourced from non-GMO corn or tapioca starch.

data.name: AdvantAllulose
data.description: AdvantAllulose™ is an ideal sugar reduction solution on its own, but also has the capacity to reduce bitterness from other high-intensity sweeteners in a blend, or act in tandem with sucrose to enhance flavor and texture. Most common applications include sodas, fruit juices, plant-based dairy, baked goods, frozen desserts, breads, snacks & confectionary.

data.name: AdvantaPea
data.description: AdvantaPea™ is 80 - 85% pea protein sourced from non-GMO Canadian yellow peas. AdvantaPea™ is mild, neutral flavor without aftertaste and is an excellent substitute for soy & whey proteins.

data.name: AdvantaFava
data.description: AdvantaFava™ is a 90% Fava Bean protein powder and provides silky texture with a neutral savory flavor. AdvantaFava™ is naturally higher in protein & potassium levels than similar plant-based proteins.

data.name: AdvantaSoy
data.description: AdvantaSoy™ is 90% Soy protein powder, a non-GMO Soy protein additive. Soy protein is still one of the most popular protein additives used in the manufacture of food products; however, non-GMO soybeans are difficult to find in the U.S. as 90% of soybean crops grown are genetically modified.

data.name: Fava Bean Protein - AdvantaFava™ Resolve 90%
data.description: AdvantaFava™ Resolve 90 is a 90% protein sourced from sustainably-grown fava beans & developed for better dispersability & suspension within application. Naturally more neutral in flavor, smoother in texture, and higher in protein than similar legume proteins (ex. pea protein),; AdvantaFava™ Resolve is ideal for dairy alternatives like milks, creamers, desserts & cheeses. Its higher Arginine, Glutamine, Potassium & BCAA levels also make fava protein a model addition to RTM sports beverages. Let us quote you on this clean label protein solution!

data.name: Fava Protein - AdvantaFava™ Nourish 90%
data.description:
AdvantaFava™ Nourish 90 is a 90% protein developed from sustainably-sourced fava beans & designed for formulations requiring a more robust mouthfeel, like meat, chicken & seafood analog innovations. Its unique gelling and water-retention qualities, high protein level & neutral flavor profile lend winning attributes to the industry's most inventive applications. 

  

Ideal for non-dairy alternatives like ice cream, creamer, yogurt & more!

data.name: Mungbean Protein - AdvantaMung™ Nourish 80%
data.description: AdvantaMung™ Nourish 80 is specifically designed for meat analog formulations and higher viscosity applications. It has higher arginine and glutamine levels than similar plant proteins, which are key components for healthy brain development and protection. This mung bean protein isolate is light yellow in color and has a silky mouthfeel with an easy-to-mask neutral flavor.

data.name: Soluble Fiber - AdvantaDextrin™
data.description:
AdvantaDextrin™ is a FDA-approved soluble dietary fiber that's easy to add to any formula, with no color, odor, or texture. This clean-label ingredient is a highly-tolerable prebiotic, shown to reduce harmful bacteria in the gut, that easily replaces brown rice syrup as a binder, while adding a beneficial fiber functionality. 

  

AdvantaDextrin™ dissolves entirely into solution & can be used in virtually any application as a fiber addition, a sweetener or binder/bulking agent, or to reduce calories in sucrose-heavy formulations. 

  

Available As: 

 
Powder or Syrup 
Non-GMO Corn or Non-GMO Tapioca 
Conventional or Organic 
 

  

Let us quote you today!

data.name: Mungbean Protein - AdvantaMung™ Resolve 80%
data.description: AdvantaMung™ Resolve 80 is an 80% mungbean protein developed to exhibit a smoother texture and higher water-holding capacity than other plant proteins, making it ideal for texture-dependent applications like pasta, and meat analogs. Its excellent foaming stability & neutral flavor also lends advantage to egg-analog and other non-dairy formulations like ice cream and milk.Ask us how AdvantaMung™ Resolve can help optimize your plant-based formulation!

data.name: Rice Protein - AdvantaRice™ Flex (Organic)
data.description: AdvantaRice™ Flex is our most functional rice protein yet. AdvantaRice™ Flex has been developed to blend seamlessly into formulas without adding chalky texture or bitterness. This latest addition is meant to be flexible enough to add protein to smooth RTD beverage formulations, dips, and spreads, and robust enough for protein-forward bars and cookies.

data.name: AdvantOleum™ SF Lecithin
data.description: AdvantOleum™ SF Lecithin is a lecithin powder derived from non-GMO Canadian sunflower seeds. It presents itself as a cream-colored, light yellow to brown powder. This lecithin powder is rich in vitamin E, known for its antioxidant properties. It also contains high levels of oleic and linoleic acids, which are beneficial for their anti-inflammatory properties.

data.name: Maltodextrin - AdvantaMaltodex™
data.description: AdvantaMaltodex™ improves the texture and 'mouthfeel' of food and beverages. It is a complex carbohydrate that is sourced from non-GMO tapioca starch, which makes AdvantaMaltodex™ non-GMO maltodextrin. This product is ideal for bodybuilders and athletes to build muscle and get extra energy.

data.name: Pea Protein - AdvantaPea™ Essential 80%
data.description:
AdvantaPea™ Essential 80 reduces reliance on animal-based proteins. This product is an excellent substitute for soy and whey proteins. AdvantaPea™ Essential 80 is ideal for blending with other plant-based proteins and is applicable for beverages, baking, meat analogs, and extrusion. 

  

Available As: 

 
Conventional or Organic

data.name: AdvantaPea
data.html_description: AdvantaPea™ is 80 - 85% pea protein sourced from non-GMO Canadian yellow peas. AdvantaPea™ is mild, neutral flavor without aftertaste and is an excellent substitute for soy & whey proteins.
data.text_description: AdvantaPea™ is 80 - 85% pea protein sourced from non-GMO Canadian yellow peas. AdvantaPea™ is mild, neutral flavor without aftertaste and is an excellent substitute for soy & whey proteins.
data.seo_title: AdvantaPea - Top Health Ingredients - Pea Protein - Non-GMO
data.seo_description: View all Top Health Ingredients AdvantaPea products on Knowde.com. Quickly and easily request a quote, get samples, and download data sheets.

content_blocks.html:
• 80-85% pea protein
  • Sourced from non-GMO Canadian yellow peas
  • Complete amino acid profile
  • Clean label ingredient
  • Mild, neutral flavor without aftertaste
  • Excellent substitute for soy & whey proteins
  • Available in conventional or organic

data.name: Pea Protein - AdvantaPea™ Essential 80%
data.description:
AdvantaPea™ Essential 80 reduces reliance on animal-based proteins. This product is an excellent substitute for soy and whey proteins. AdvantaPea™ Essential 80 is ideal for blending with other plant-based proteins and is applicable for beverages, baking, meat analogs, and extrusion. 

  

Available As: 

 
Conventional or Organic

data.name: Pea Protein - AdvantaPea™ Nourish 85%
data.description: AdvantaPea™ Nourish 85 is specifically designed for meat analog and extrusion applications. AdvantaPea™ Nourish 85 has been created for this precise purpose. Its unique gelling qualities, water retention capabilities, and mild flavor profile make the perfect combination for innovative meat analog formulas.

data.name: Pea Protein - AdvantaPea™ Resolve 85%
data.description: AdvantaPea™ Resolve 85 is perfect for texture-less applications, such as ice creams, RTD beverages, dressings/spreads, etc. It reduces reliance on animal-based proteins and is ideal for blending with other plant-based proteins. Versions for beverages and baking, as well as meat analog and extrusion, are available. AdvantaPea™ Resolve 85 is suitable for use in beverages and is soluble.

data.name: AdvantaPea™ Flex 85
data.description: AdvantaPea™ Flex 85 is an 85% soluble pea protein powder sourced from non-GMO Canadian yellow peas. It serves as an excellent substitute for soy and whey proteins, making it an ideal choice for blending with other plant-based proteins. It has a mild, neutral flavor without an aftertaste.

WHY_KNOWDE.HEADING: Interact with over 8,000 suppliers, browse their catalogs, access documents and download starter formulations.

SECTION_1.HEADING: Instant access to the most comprehensive product catalog
SECTION_1.DESCRIPTION: Browse, search and filter the world's largest catalog of chemicals, ingredients and polymers.

SECTION_2.HEADING: Talk directly to suppliers' experts
SECTION_2.DESCRIPTION: Ask technical product questions, talk to a sales rep and inquire about pricing.

SECTION_3.HEADING: Order samples, request documents, and get quotes
SECTION_3.DESCRIPTION: Knowde concierge will handle all the details and ensure your requests are handled faster than ever.

WHY_CHEMISTRY.HEADING: Driving the world's most impactful industry forward.

SECTION_1.DESCRIPTION: At Knowde, we believe in the power of chemistry. We believe that easy and efficient access to information and raw materials enables you to work smarter and faster so you can continue to make a rich global impact.

SECTION_2.DESCRIPTION: Your innovations have decreased the carbon footprint of the automotive industry, imagined a sustainable agricultural future, developed alternative, biodegradable packaging materials, and changed the landscape of connectivity forever – to name a few. This is only the beginning.
SECTION_2.HEADING: We can't wait to see what you create with Knowde.

REDIRECT_TO_KNOWDE.HEADING: You’re being taken to Knowde to manage your requests with ease
REDIRECT_TO_KNOWDE.PARAGRAPH: Knowde is {companyName}’s tool for managing all of your sample & document requests, RFQs, orders, and more in one place.

CONCIERGE.TITLE: CONCIERGE ONLY

SELLER_ARRANGED.TITLE: Seller-Arranged Shipping
SELLER_ARRANGED.DESCRIPTION: The seller is responsible for contracting a carrier and shipping the product to their facilities.

BUYER_ARRANGED.TITLE: Buyer-Arranged Shipping
BUYER_ARRANGED.DESCRIPTION: The buyer is responsible for contracting a carrier and shipping the product to their facilities.

SHIPPING.SUBHEADING: The location that is the last stopping point for your shipment.
SHIPPING.CHECKBOX_TITLE: Final Destination same as Delivery Address

MISSING_PROVIDER.MESSAGE: Knowde will provide a rate within 24 hours, once you place your order.

KNOWDE_PAY.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: A flexible payment service powered by Knowde.
KNOWDE_PAY.LONG_DESCRIPTION: Now you can quickly transact online and avoid the hassle of establishing a new line of credit. Knowde will issue invoices and collect payments on behalf of the Supplier.

OFFLINE_PAYMENT.SUBHEADER: {companyName} will invoice your account off platform.

TAX_EXEMPTION.TITLE: Tax Exemption
TAX_EXEMPTION.LABEL: Cart items are tax-exempt
TAX_EXEMPTION.NOTE: Unchecking this will apply sales and use tax to all cart items

SUMMARY.NOTE: You will only be charged once your order ships.

ORDER.TITLE: Order

ERRORS.SHIPPING_TITLE: Please fix the following before proceeding to payment

MULTIPLE_SUPPLIERS.MESSAGE: Please ensure all items are from the same supplier before proceeding to checkout.

CONFLICTING_INCOTERMS.TITLE: Items in your cart have conflicting Incoterms.
CONFLICTING_INCOTERMS.MESSAGE: Please remove any items until all Incoterms match.

ITEM_EXPIRED.TITLE: The quote for this line item has expired, please request a new quote from the seller.

BILLING_ADDRESS.TITLE: A Billing Address is required

TERMS.TITLE: You must agree to the Ecommerce Terms & Conditions.

CURRENCY_MISMATCH.TITLE: Your Cart can only contain products with the same currency. Products with different currencies are moved to Saved for Later

ITEM_QUANTITY_LESS_THAN_MOQ.MESSAGE: The seller may not fulfill production at this level.

ITEM_QUANTITY_MORE_THAN_MAX_QUANTITY.MESSAGE: The seller may not fulfill production at this level.

ITEM_NEARLY_EXPIRED.TITLE: The quote for this line item will expire in less than a month.
ITEM_NEARLY_EXPIRED.MESSAGE: Please order before Quote Expiry Date.

EXPERTS_PAGE.TITLE: {companyName} experts - Knowde
EXPERTS_PAGE.WE_CAN_GUIDE_YOU: We can guide you to the best product for your application and answer any questions.

FLAVOR_ANALYZER.HEADER: Need a flavor that’s not in our online PRIMETIME catalog?
FLAVOR_ANALYZER.DISCOVER_FLAVORS: Tap into our expansive offline portfolio of over 500,000 flavors! Our Portfolio Team can assist in identifying the perfect flavor for your needs. Tell us more about what you’re looking for.
FLAVOR_ANALYZER.ORDER_LIMITS: (** Minimum order quantities may apply and exceed standard PRIMETIME Flavors minimum orders. Certain applications excluded.)

PAYWALL.TITLE_1: Get new products to market faster with a free Knowde Marketplace account
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_1: Gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers from 8,000 suppliers. Browse, search, and filter to quickly compare products, find information, request documents, order samples, and get quotes directly from suppliers.
PAYWALL.TITLE_2: The fastest way to find the right raw materials for your products
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_2: Search and filter over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers, access documents and download starter formulations. Interact with over 8,000 suppliers whose representatives are ready to help. Sign up for a free Knowde Marketplace account today.
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_3: Create a free account to gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 products and their documents.
